Class AbstractUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    User
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Customer, Trader

    public abstract class AbstractUser
extends java.lang.Object
implements User
    An abstract class for the users of the system. Does the shared basic operations of the users.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String ID 
      protected java.lang.String name 
      protected java.lang.String password 
      protected static int userCount

      This is a constructor for a user that has been registered to the system before.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractUser

        public AbstractUser(java.lang.String userName)
        This is a constructor for a user that is not registered to the system before. Automatically determines the user id, asks for a password. Saves the user into the UsersInfo.txt file.
        Parameters:
        userName - is the user's name who is going to be created.

      • AbstractUser

        public AbstractUser(java.lang.String userID,
            java.lang.String userPass)
        This is a constructor for a user that has been registered to the system before. Checks if the user actually was registered before. Automatically sets the information of the user.
        Parameters:
        userID - is the ID of the user.
        userPass - is the password of the user.

      • AbstractUser

        public AbstractUser(java.lang.String userID,
            java.lang.String userName,
            java.lang.String userPass,
            boolean check)
        This is a constructor for a user that has been registered to the system before. Pre: Assumes the user was actually registered before does not check. Automatically sets the information of the user.
        Parameters:
        userID -
        userName -
        userPass -
        check -
